data.value:
When we are at our best we often find ourselves doing the same types of things, and although we may not see these strengths ourselves, others do - hence the value of this exercise.

Read carefully the stories and look for common themes.

data.label: In the light of these stories, how would you summarize what is being said about your strengths?
